system.notes: Average Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Held in place by barbs and hooks that inflict pain on the wearer. Those not used to this must make +0 Willpower or Toughness Test or gain a level of fatigue when donning it, and may frequently express displeasure while wearing it. Likely Human Wearable, if uncomfortable.
